#summary Data structure of Handle

== Handle Data Structure ==

Essentially a handle record is a set of values. Each value is a tuple with 7 fields: index, type, data, ttl, permission, timestamp, reference.

|| || 100 || ADMIN || {...} || {...} || {...} || ... || {...} ||

ยง Simple values.

In the table above '`{...}`' symbolizes a complex value. Other values (expressed or '`...`') are simple scalars.
